title: Sri Lankan Food Calorie Tracker and Suggestion App
description: A mobile application that leverages machine learning to detect Sri Lankan dishes, estimate their calorie content, and provide dietary suggestions.

title: Research Forge

title: Department Management System
description: A desktop application developed using Java Swing to manage department and department location data in a database. The application includes features to insert, update, display and delete records for departments and their respective locations.
